import React from'react';var VARIANTS=['left','center','right','top','middle','bottom','outline','even','reverse','all'];/**
 * <Grid />
 * 
 * ```jsx
 * <Grid
 *   reversed
 * >
 *   <Article
 *      className="alegrify-grid__cell alegrify-grid__cell--8"
 *   />
 *   <Aside
 *      className="alegrify-grid__cell alegrify-grid__cell--4"
 *   />
 * </Grid>
 * ```
 */function Grid(props){var classNames=['alegrify-grid'];if(props.className){classNames.push(props.className);}VARIANTS.forEach(function(variant){if(props[variant]){classNames.push("alegrify-grid--".concat(variant));}});return React.createElement("div",{className:classNames.join(' ')},props.children);}Grid.defaultProps={};Grid.propExamples={};export default Grid;Grid.__docgenInfo={"description":"<Grid />\n\n```jsx\n<Grid\n  reversed\n>\n  <Article\n     className=\"alegrify-grid__cell alegrify-grid__cell--8\"\n  />\n  <Aside\n     className=\"alegrify-grid__cell alegrify-grid__cell--4\"\n  />\n</Grid>\n```","methods":[],"displayName":"Grid","props":{"children":{"type":{"name":"union","value":[{"name":"arrayOf","value":{"name":"node"}},{"name":"node"}]},"required":true,"description":"Content"},"className":{"type":{"name":"string"},"required":false,"description":"Additional classnames"},"left":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Align cells left"},"center":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Align cells center"},"right":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Align cells right"},"top":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Align cells on top"},"middle":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Align cells in the middle (vertically)"},"bottom":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Align cells at the bottom"},"outline":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Align cells outline"},"even":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Align cells evenly (space-around)"},"reverse":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Reverse the order"},"all":{"type":{"name":"bool"},"required":false,"description":"Also show grid on smaller screens"}}};
